pages.text: A $(item)Monster Spawner$() activates when a $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Player$() comes within a spherical radius of 16 blocks from the center point of the block and constantly spawns instances of that mob as long as a $(l:creatures/human-player)$(item)Player$() is nearby and, if applicable for the mob it spawns, if there are valid dark areas nearby.

It cannot be obtained as an item in survival mode or moved by a $(l:redstone/redstone_components#piston)$(item)Piston$(), and it drops only experience orbs when broken. $(br2)The $(item)Spawner$() can be configured to spawn a desired mob by using a $(item)Spawn Egg$() on the placed block.
